TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationManager extends System.MarshalByRefObject
Public NotInheritable Class ApplicationManager Inherits MarshalByRefObject
public ref class ApplicationManager sealed : MarshalByRefObject

summary.span: Manages ASP.NET application domains for an ASP.NET hosting application.

span.span: Manages ASP.NET application domains for an ASP.NET hosting application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象提供的 ASP.NET 应用程序的宿主环境中的对象的生存期管理。The object provides lifetime management of objects in the hosting environment for an ASP.NET application. 它负责下列操作：It is responsible for: - 激活并初始化 ASP.NET 应用程序。Activating and initializing ASP.NET applications. - 管理应用程序和对象的生存期注册应用程序中。Managing the application lifetime and the lifetime of objects registered in the application. - 公开宿主环境用于处理 ASP.NET 应用程序请求的对象。Exposing objects used by the hosting environment to process ASP.NET application requests. - 提供在任何给定时刻在宿主进程中运行的应用程序的列表。Providing a list of applications running in the hosting process at any given moment.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

span.span: Shuts down all application domains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用方法，可以减少使用的应用程序管理器为 0，应用程序的引用计数方法调用方法。If a call to the method reduces the reference count of applications using the application manager to 0, the method calls the method.

summary.span: Creates an object for the specified application domain based on type, virtual and physical paths, and a Boolean value indicating failure behavior when an object of the specified type already exists.

span.span: Creates an object for the specified application domain based on type, virtual and physical paths, and a Boolean value indicating failure behavior when an object of the specified type already exists.

returns.span: A new object of the specified .

span.span: A new object of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于创建和注册应用程序中的对象。The method is used to create and register objects in the application. 可以创建的每种类型的一个对象。Only one object of each type can be created. 如果你需要创建多个相同类型的对象，则必须实现的对象工厂。If you need to create multiple objects of the same type, you must implement an object factory. 有关详细信息，请参阅本主题中的代码示例。For more information, see the code example in this topic. 每个应用程序，由唯一的应用程序标识符，标识在其自己的应用程序域中运行。Each application, identified by a unique application identifier, runs in its own application domain. 方法中指定的应用程序的应用程序域中创建指定类型的对象`appID`参数。The method creates an object of the specified type in the application domain of the application specified in the `appID` parameter. 如果应用程序域不存在指定应用程序中，将创建对象之前，创建一个。If an application domain does not exist for the specified application, one is created before the object is created. `failIfExists`参数控制的行为方法时应用程序中已存在的指定类型的对象。The `failIfExists` parameter controls the behavior of the method when an object of the specified type already exists in the application. 当`failIfExists`是`true`、方法抛出异常异常。When `failIfExists` is `true`, the method throws an exception. 当`failIfExists`是`false`、方法返回指定类型的现有已注册的对象。When `failIfExists` is `false`, the method returns the existing registered object of the specified type. 方法调用的重载采用一个附加`throwOnError`参数`throwOnError`设置为`false`。The method calls the overload that takes an additional `throwOnError` parameter with `throwOnError` set to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是已注册的对象的对象工厂设计模式的实现。The following code example is an implementation of the object-factory design pattern for registered objects. 使用工厂模式，可注册的对象的多个实例。Using the factory pattern enables you to register multiple instances of an object. 此示例包含两个对象： `SampleComponent`，即应用程序的对象将使用的多个实例和`SampleComponentFactory`，其将管理一份`SampleComponent`实例。The example contains two objects: `SampleComponent`, which is the object the application will use multiple instances of, and `SampleComponentFactory`, which manages a list of `SampleComponent` instances. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager/CS/appManagercs.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager/VB/appManagervb.aspx.vb#1)]

summary.span: Returns the single instance of the object associated with this ASP.NET host process.

span.span: Returns the single instance of the object associated with this ASP.NET host process.

returns.span: The single instance of the object associated with the ASP.NET host process that is running.

span.span: The single instance of the object associated with the ASP.NET host process that is running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个实例由 ASP.NET 主机进程默认应用程序域中创建对象。Only one instance of the object is created by an ASP.NET host process in the default application domain. 实例时，如果类不可用，方法首先创建的一个实例类，然后返回新创建的对象。If an instance of the class is not available, the method first creates an instance of the class and then returns the newly created object. 实例时，如果以前创建类，方法将返回现有对象。If an instance of the class was previously created, the method returns the existing object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来检索Web 应用程序的实例。The following code example uses the method to retrieve the instance for a Web application. summary.span: Gives the application domain an infinite lifetime by preventing a lease from being created.

span.span: Gives the application domain an infinite lifetime by preventing a lease from being created.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将替代其基类中的方法。This method overrides the method in its base class. 它始终返回`null`，从而防止创建租约，会限制应用程序域的生存期。It always returns `null` and thereby prevents a lease from being created that would limit the application domain's lifetime.

span.span: Unloads all application resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法等效于调用由此管理的所有应用程序域中的方法实例; 但是，方法可以从调用的托管应用程序域之外。Calling the method is equivalent to calling the method in all application domains managed by this instance; however, the method can be called from outside the managed application domains.
